channel.title: Domain Takeovers on defektive
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Takeovers on defektive

item.title: Firebase
item.description: Currently Firebase protects against domain takeovers by requiring each domain to have a unique CNAME or TXT record record on the affected domain.

item.title: Squarespace
item.description: Currently Squarespace protects against domain takeovers by requiring each domain to have a unique CNAME record on the affected domain.
